title: Pages
lyrics:
The only Truth
The One who was and always is
The Absolute
The very word that gave me breath
You are speaking to my heart

Like a spotlight in the dark

Revealing just who You are

It's who You are



In the pages

I find everything I need

In the pages

All the promises You keep

Never failing (oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh)

In the pages

I found Your love in the pages

Love in the pages, love in the pages

Love in the pages (oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh)



So powerful

So much stronger than the grave

A miracle

A love letter that can save



You are speaking to my heart

Like a spotlight in the dark

Revealing just who You are

It's who You are



In the pages

I find everything I need

In the pages

All the promises You keep

Never failing (oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh)

In the pages

I found Your love in the pages

Love in the pages, love in the pages

Love in the pages (oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh)



I found Your love in the pages

I found Your love

I found Your love in the pages

I found Your love



In the pages

I find everything I need

In the pages

All the promises You keep

Never failing (oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh)

In the pages

I found Your love in the pages

Love in the pages, love in the pages

Love in the pages (oh-ooh, oh-oh-oh-oh)

Love in the pages, love in the pages

Love in the pages
